The claim originated from a parody Twitt: NotThis News" that specializes in creating fake news stories.
The video shared by: NotThis News" featured footage of Drake Bell, a Nickelodeon star, visiting YouTuber Brian Awadis (FaZe Rug) in January 2017, which was unrelated to the Make-a-Wish incident.
The tweets shown in the video were also: but they were actually posted on the same day the video was released.
